授業方法: Lecture. PPP presentation and class discussion; the course follows a seminar approach

第1回: Introduction: The new geography of the global automobile industry
第2回: The development of the automobile industry: A historical overview
第3回: The automobile industry in the Triad: North America
第4回: The automobile industry in the Triad: Europe
第5回: The automobile industry in the Triad: Japan
第6回: The Korean automobile industry: A global latecomer
第7回: The revival of traditional automobile production locations: Eastern and Central Eastern Europe
第8回: New locations of automobile production and consumption: China
第9回: New locations of automobile production and consumption: India
第10回: New locations of automobile production and consumption: Brazil and Mexico
第11回: New locations of automobile production and consumption: ASEAN
第12回: Unknown places: The automobile industry in Turkey and North Africa (Morocco)
第13回: The last frontiers of the automobile industry: Sub-Sahara Africa
第14回: Summary: The future of automobile manufacturing
